reviews.review: there are indeed portals in this game :)
Very cool. One of the best games ever, the story is good and every level is good and packed with story. The CO-OP is also very good. Hopefully, Valve starts making F-stop. Please buy this if you can
真的是歪歪滴艾斯，绝绝子，好玩到跺jiojio，我直接暴风吸入内存颗粒

===Gráficos===
🔲 Atari
🔲 Paint
🔲 Aceitável
🔲 Bom
✅ Ótimo (pra 2011)
🔲 The Witcher 3
🔲 Red Dead Redemption II
🔲 Cada frame foi pintado por Da Vinci

===Requisitos===
🔲 Qualquer coisa que conduza energia
🔲 Uma calculadora com 1 pilha
✅ PC da XUXA ou HOTWHEELS
✅ PC de entrada
🔲 PC Gamer
🔲 PC Master Race
🔲 PC com I9 10900k + 2x Rtx 3090 (jogo mal otimizado)

===História===
🔲 História? que história?
🔲 Tem uma historinha
🔲 Uma história bacana
✅ Uma história digna de prestar atenção
🔲 É sobre a vida real
🔲 Feita pelo Tolkien ( prepare seus lenços )
🔲 Platão escreveu junto com Machado de Assis e virou novela das 21h.

===Jogabilidade===
🔲 Precisa de dois dedos pra jogar
🔲 Aceitável (4 dedos pra ser específico)
🔲 Jogabilidade bacana
✅ Jogabilidade excelente

===Complexidade===
🔲 Jogo da velha é mais complexo
🔲 Fácil de entender
✅Fácil de aprender, difícil de dominar
🔲 É daqueles jogos que as pessoas ficam estudando
🔲 Precisa de, no mínimo, 2 doutorados

===Dificuldade===
🔲 Você escolhe a dificuldade
🔲 Seu cachorro consegue
🔲 Da pra zerar com uma batata de controle
🔲 Fácil
🔲 Médio
🔲 Quase Dark Souls
🔲 Dark Souls
✅ Você precisa de de, no mínimo, 2 doutorados e um Q.i de mais 100

===Tempo de jogo===
🔲 Da jogar enquanto ouve 1 música
🔲 6h
✅ 12h (campanha solo)
🔲 24h
🔲 48h
✅ 100h+ (oficina)
🔲 Você começa, seu neto termina

===Áudio, músicas===
🔲 Beep
🔲 É melhor jogar no mudo
🔲 Aceitável
✅ Muito bom
🔲 Músicas escritas por Hans Zimmer
🔲 Mozart escreveu junto com Beethoven

===Bugs===
✅ Nunca vi nenhum
🔲 Pequenos bugs
🔲 Pode ficar irritante
🔲 Pode estragar a gameplay
🔲 Assassin's Creed: Unity
🔲 Cyberpunk 2077

===Publico===
✅ Crianças
✅Adolescentes
✅ Adultos
🔲 Moradores do porão da mãe que comem maionese
✅ Tudo e todos

===Compensa Comprar? ===
🔲 IT'S FREE
✅ Preço justo
🔲 Compre se tiver dinheiro sobrando
✅ Espere uma promoção
🔲 Caro demais não recomendo
🔲 Mais fácil você queimar seu dinheiro

Gra genialna, wybitna,
Gdy masz kolegę,
W co-opie znakomita.

Mimo, że Valve może,
Choć wielu tego chcę,
Każdą trójkę umorze.

Polecam gorąco i życzliwie,
Na portali eksplorację,
Trzy złote przeznaczyć gorliwie.

pls valv
Amazing! Even after all this time.
you're not gonna find a better classic puzzle game like this anywhere else, especially not one with a great co-op as well
за 30р моё почтение покупал давно прошол по быстрому и мне все понравилось поломать голову попрыгать по порталам и прохадить головоломки

谢谢面酱带我玩这款躺在我游戏库里两年的传送门2
很好玩，虽然我经常玩到一半就停止思考（“在这放门是吗？好，什么颜色的来着
还能坑队友（往这放个门试试。面酱：“你怎么突然改门啊，我死了！！
就是有点晕3d不能玩太久，总之就是非常好玩！
even 10 years after, this game is wonderfull
great game, much more polished than the first. lots of sarcastic comments from gladys. overall very good game
great game even if its old
Ху-nя из под коня. 1/3 игры - е**чие тесты из первой части, остальная часть - конец первой части.

One of the best games ever made with great physics, easy to understand mechanics, loads of secrets and easter eggs and a really good and interesting story and lore. Just a lot of fun in single player and multiplayer with friends.
My favourite game ever, It has a lot of replay-ability and is very fun to play with friends. I do have one issue where the game caps at 30 fps but it's fine by me.
pls portal 3 for the love of god
Its very funny game singeplayer very good coop is epic trolling
When I started speedrunning this I was a loser, that's the same but at least I know how to beat this game fast

Ok i never do serious reviews but here we go. Holy shit, if you've never played the game, buy this shit RIGHT NOW. This is not a forgetfull experience at all. The charm the characters have is funny, and even sad. This game almost had me in tears at the end. I love this game and its easily the best game ive played period. This series has had such a large impact on the game industry as a whole. The voices are amazingly done, and i think this is the gold standard for video games. 10/10 i recommend this game
If you have never played this game before, you have missed out, this is my favorite puzzle game of all time

Slah mano
jogo bom
promoção, pega sem medp
Como juegues con tu amigo el cachondo mamón quizás te dan severos síncopes de las risas que te echas. El lore es algo de lo que indagar más, viendo los easter eggs o videos en internet, es la leche.
good game brings me back to my childhood

诚意满满
单人地图双倍长度，难度也有所升级
双人地图就是白给你的一个游戏方式
理论上无限地图（只要还有社区创作者）

传送门2，没玩过第一步，第二部双人和朋友玩过一部分，今天突然兴起开始了单人闯关，在完全“科学”的世界中真的开阔我的眼界，游戏的时代背景，剧情设定真的特别棒，需要无时无刻不思考，真的太棒了，还有很多细节处理，不同时代的人物相框，不同年代的测试时间，不同时期的发明......，太棒了，艺术品
amazing game, most polished game I've played in a while
S C I E N C E T E S T I N G T E S T I N G S C I E N C E
Рекомендуете ли вы эту игру другим пользователям? Да

dont have much hours in Portal but i can already say that its an amazing game.
with or without friends its a lot of fun.
the humor and the gameplay is next level.
개인적으로 퍼즐게임 좋아하는 사람중에 이 게임 안하면 인생 손해봤다 할정도로 재미있음
Way better to play than watch, trust me.
puzzles dificeis, bons e divertidos de serem resolvidos com uma história melhor ainda

absolute masterpiece

contains:
[spoiler] fat turret [/spoiler]
[spoiler] a massive vault with a tiny door [/spoiler]
[spoiler] funny bri'ish ball robot [/spoiler]
[spoiler] glados calling you fat [/spoiler]
and amazing gameplay, along with level creator and lots of other cool stuff!

cannot recommend enough
wspaniała gra i genialny humor IM NOT A MORON
这个游戏挺不错的，隔三差五做个特价，买着不贵，就是有点费脑子
Игра охуённая, берите, раз 5 перепрошел, еще и кооператив есть, можно на пару десятков часов с друзьями затусить

Sehr gutes spiel! Ich feier es,weil es so schön und cool gemacht wurde vorallem der Baumodus! die mods kann man leider nur im internet installieren (zb: Bee mod) aber trotzdem ein tooles Spiel! Ein danke an die Entwickler!

这是唯一一个让人玩到心烦意乱，但是越烦越想玩的游戏，一句话总结大多数的《传送门2》玩家“越菜越爱玩"
不要和损友们一起玩双人模式，坑你没商量，分分钟让你玩到想杀人
ne desem bilim kurgu oyunu gibi hikaye çok güzel yani 18.50 lira iyi fiyata iyi oyundur.
написать обзор и чото там получить хочу в общен ми плоха
Игра, которая заставит считать себя тупым, затем гением; ненавидеть друга в коопе, затем примириться... И все это за одну минуту) Топ игра!
This is one of the best things valve has ever made and I also feel that portal 3 if it continues the story it would be very disappointing because this game brings a beautiful end to the story
this game makes me feel smart
They really nailed down the vibe with this game, absolutely stunning story too! Definitely worth a play through, great puzzles!
This game is AWESOME, the tests are challenging but not annoying. I LOVE the humor in the game, some things are so funny. Graphics still look epic up to date.
ладно, я меняю свое мнение.Хорошая игра
сука я заебался решать эти головоломки нахуй
